author: ETA PRIME
description:
Build a low-cost, small-form-factor gaming PC that punches way above its price! In this video, I show you exactly which parts to use and the performance you can expect. Powered by an 8-core Ryzen CPU and the underrated Intel ARC B570 (10GB GDDR6), this compact rig delivers buttery 1080p and confident 1440p AAA gameplay—without breaking the bank. I’ll cover the full parts list, thermals, noise, power draw, gaming benchmarks, and the best upgrades if you want even more performance.

Intel ARC B570:  https://click.linksynergy.com/link?id=QSbj1leJ2v4&offerid=1786142.4458314021598184013363696&type=2&murl=https%3a%2f%2fwww.newegg.com%2fasrock-challenger-b570-cl-10go-arc-b570-10gb-graphics-card-double-fans%2fp%2fN82E16814930134%3fitem%3dN82E16814930134
AMD Ryzen 5700G: https://ebay.us/hb53j1
Mini mATX Case: https://amzn.to/3YOoHDZ
Used Motherboard and CPU eBAY: https://ebay.us/4FPtf5
16GB DDR4: https://amzn.to/3F6Mloz
M.2 SSD: https://amzn.to/43qP0BB
550W PSU: https://amzn.to/43kbmVj

Follow
title: You Can Build A FAST SFF Gaming PC on The Cheap!
